posts.post_text: September 6, 2018 at 11:09 PM#2there is no inbuilt direct way to trigger macrosyntax on the release of a button.one workaround for your scenario:assign your 3 specialmasters to 3 executors on some unused page, assign the Black function the execbuttoncreate 3 DMX-remotes using the same DMX channel, triggering these 3 executorsPatch an extra dimmerchannel to the said dmx-channel and store it to an executor with a flash-button
